default.name: addition_assignment
default.note: add to location, set to zero by default

1.name: insert
1.note: inserts value after indicated cell (applied immediately)

-1.name: subtraction_assignment
-1.note: add/subtract, similar to the default addition_assignment

-2.name: division_assignment
-2.note: add/subtract, similar to the default addition_assignment

3.name: pop
3.note: addition_assignment. for ref, also remove cell from ref_list

list.name: pop_and_append
list.note: pop from ref_list and append to act_list

4.name: exponent_assignment
4.note: raise to power of supplied argument

-4.name: root_assignment
-4.note: take root at power of supplied argument
